text: Ilya Muromets () is a 1956 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Ptushko.«Мосфильм» предложил повторно показать фильмы Тарковского и ШахназароваИЛЬЯ МУРОМЕЦ It stars Boris Andreyev, Ninel Myshkova, and Shukur Burkhanov. ==Actors== * Boris Andreyev – Ilya Muromets * Ninel Myshkova – Vassilisa * Shukur Burkhanov – Tsar Kalin * Andrey Abrikosov – Prince Vladimir * Natalya Medvedeva – Princess Apraksia == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ptushko
title: Ilya Muromets (movie)
